properties.Name: SourceDocumentType
properties.Description:
A categorization of source documents based on business function, characteristics etc.

Ex:
- Customer invoice
- Supplier invoice
- Purchase order
- Cash Receipt
- Money Transfer = multiple transactions

Columns.Name: SourceDocumentTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Source Document Type.

Columns.Name: SourceDocumentTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Source Document Type.

Columns.Name: SourceDocumentTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Source Document Type.
